rules.title: $t(common:appName.full) Rules
rules.1: The game is held once a month
rules.2: There are 5 levels based on the vote A, B, C, D, F
rules.3: Student who gets the zero number of votes gets an "F"
rules.4: F must do whatever level A,B,C,D tell him/her to do
rules.5: B,C,D can order level below them to do only when A approves
rules.6: Whoever leak this information outside the players, gets penalty
rules.aggreement: I, hereby agree to participate in the Pyramid game under the preceding rules.
